message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. My initial offer is $1300000. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1250000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm afraid $1250000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $1350000. Let me know if this is more in line with what you're willing to pay.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the gesture, I'm still not able to meet you at $1350000. Considering my budget and the value I place on this product, I propose an offer of $1300000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
